Title: Nvidia identifies Huawei as top competitor for the first time in filing

Title: Nvidia set to reveal new AI technologies at annual conference
Short Description: Nvidia Corp Chief Executive Jensen Huang is expected on Tuesday to disclose new artificial intelligence chips and technologies at the company's annual conference for software developers.

Title: Exclusive-Nvidia's plans for sales to Huawei imperiled if U.S. tightens Huawei curbs-draft
Short Description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia Corp's plans to sell technology to China's Huawei would be thwarted if the U.S. government proceeds with a proposal to further restrict shipments to the blacklisted company, a draft report by a government contractor shows.

Title: Nvidia files mixed shelf offering of up to $10 billion
Short Description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia Corp filed a mixed shelf offering of as much as $10 billion with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday.

Title: Nvidia results show its growing lead in AI chip race
Short Description: As the artificial intelligence boom takes off, Nvidia Corp is expected to emerge as the biggest - though not the only - winner among chipmakers after years of focusing on the technology has made it a go-to supplier for tech firms.

Short Description: Chip designer Nvidia Corp forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, expecting the artificial intelligence boom to drive up sales of its data center chips.

Short Description: Chip designer Nvidia Corp said on Wednesday the U.S. government has imposed a new license requirement for any future export of its A100 and H100 chips to China, including Hong Kong. (Reporting by Eva Mathews in Bengaluru; Editing by Devika Syamnath)

Title: Nvidia predicts third-quarter sales below expectations

Title: Nvidia expects second-quarter revenue to drop on gaming weakness

Short Description: Chip designer Nvidia Corp forecast second-quarter revenue below estimates on Wednesday, bracing for supply chain snags and slowing demand for graphics chips used in gaming devices.

Short Description: Nvidia Corp's <NVDA.O> upbeat current-quarter revenue forecast on Thursday underscored surging demand for its graphics chips used in data centers, gaming devices and cryptocurrency mining, sending its shares up as much as 12 percent in extended trading.

Title: AMD, Nvidia blockchain prospects excite investors
Short Description: Advanced Micro Devices Inc's <AMD.O> blockbuster quarterly earnings has turned the spotlight on chip sales to providers of blockchain technology, a digital ledger that is set for explosive growth as it moves beyond cryptocurrencies.

Title: Chinese carmaker Chery to use Nvidia's self-driving technology
Short Description: Nvidia Corp said on Tuesday China's Chery Automobile Co [CHERY.UL] would use its self-driving technology that it has developed with Baidu and ZF Friedrichshafen AG [ZFF.UL].

Title: Chipmaker Nvidia tops estimates on gaming, data center boost
Short Description: Nvidia Corp's <NVDA.O> quarterly profit and revenue topped market estimates and the chipmaker also gave a strong revenue forecast for the current quarter, powered by demand for its graphics chips used in gaming and data centers.

Title: NVIDIA unveils next-generation platform for fully autonomous cars
Short Description: Silicon Valley graphics chipmaker NVIDIA unveiled on Tuesday the first computer chips for developing fully autonomous vehicles and said it had more than 25 customers working to build a new class of driverless cars, robotaxis and long-haul trucks.

Title: BRIEF-NVIDIA, Baidu announce partnership to accelerate AI
Short Description: * Nvidia - co, baidu announced partnership to bring artificial intelligence technology to cloud computing, self-driving vehicles and ai home assistants

Title: BRIEF-Nvidia to launch graphic cards specifically designed for cryptocurrency mining - CNBC
Short Description: * Nvidia will release graphic cards specifically designed for cryptocurrency mining through its partners - CNBC, citing source Source text - http://cnb.cx/2sXMDVf Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom)

Title: Volkswagen, Nvidia to cooperate on artificial intelligence
Short Description: German carmaker Volkswagen said on Tuesday it would cooperate with U.S. chipmaker Nvidia on deep learning software that could be used to manage traffic flows or make it easier for humans to work with robots.

Title: Volvo and Autoliv team up with Nvidia for self-driving cars
Short Description: Volvo Cars and Swedish car safety supplier Autoliv <ALV.N> have signed a deal with U.S. firm Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O>, best known for its graphics technology in computer games, to develop software systems for self-driving cars.

Title: REFILE--Nvidia partners with Volvo, auto suppliers, in self-driving deals
Short Description: Chipmaker Nvidia Corp announced on Monday it was partnering with Volvo Cars and Swedish auto supplier Autoliv to develop self-driving car technology for vehicles due to hit the market by 2021.

Title: Nvidia says Toyota will use its AI technology for self-driving cars
Short Description: Nvidia Corp announced a partnership with Toyota Motor Corp on Wednesday, saying the Japanese car maker would use Nvidia's artificial intelligence technology to develop self-driving vehicle systems planned for the next few years.

Title: BRIEF-Nvidia, Toyota collaborate to accelerate market introduction of autonomous cars
Short Description: * Nvidia and Toyota collaborate to accelerate market introduction of autonomous cars

Title: BRIEF-NVidia reports Q1 non-GAAP earnings per share $0.85
Short Description: * NVidia announces financial results for first quarter fiscal 2018

Title: BRIEF-Nvidia Q1 revenue from gpu business $1,562 million
Short Description: * Q1 revenue from GPU business $1,562 million versus $1,079 million

Title: Nvidia's data center business powers revenue beat
Short Description: Nvidia Corp <NVDA.O> reported a better-than-expected 48.4 percent jump in quarterly revenue, helped by strong demand for its chips that are used by major cloud computing providers in data centers.

Title: Chipmaker Nvidia's quarterly revenue jumps 48.4 pct
Short Description: Nvidia Corp reported a 48.4 percent jump in quarterly revenue, helped by strong demand for its graphics chips and its diversification into fast-growing areas such as self-driving systems and artificial intelligence.

Title: BRIEF-Nvidia CEO's 2017 total compensation was $12.2 million
Short Description: * CEO Jen-Hsun Huang's FY 2017 total compensation was $12.2 million versus $10 million in fy 2016

Title: Chipmaker Nvidia says working with Paccar on driverless trucks
Short Description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia Corp said on Thursday it was working with truckmaker Paccar Inc to develop autonomous vehicles.

Title: Graphics-chip maker Nvidia's revenue beats expectations
Short Description: Nvidia Corp's quarterly revenue surged more than 50 percent for the second straight quarter and beat expectations, helped by rising demand for its graphics chips and strength in rapidly growing areas such as self-driving systems and artificial intelligence.

Title: Graphics-chip maker Nvidia's revenue surges 55.1 pct
Short Description: Nvidia Corp's quarterly revenue surged more than 50 percent for the second straight quarter, helped by rising demand for its graphics chips and strength in rapidly growing areas such as self-driving systems and artificial intelligence.

Title: Nvidia posts biggest quarterly revenue growth in six years; shares soar
Short Description: (This Nov. 10, 2016 story was refiled to correct the quarter in paragraph 12 to "third" from "second")

Title: Strong demand for graphics chips to boost Nvidia's revenue
Short Description: Nvidia Corp forecast better-than-expected revenue for the current quarter as it sees robust demand for its chips that power complex computer graphics.

Title: Nvidia settles feud with Samsung over graphics patents
Short Description: Graphics chip maker Nvidia Corp announced a settlement of a patent dispute with Samsung Electronics Co Ltd on Monday, hours before a U.S. trade agency was due to rule on a complaint that could have blocked importation of some of Nvidia's products.

Title: U.S. trade body declines Nvidia's review petition against Samsung
Short Description: A U.S. trade body on Monday upheld its earlier decision that rejected Nvidia Corp's claims of patent violation by Samsung Electronics Co and Qualcomm Inc over use of Nvidia's graphics chip technology.

Title: Samsung did not infringe Nvidia graphics chip patents: U.S. ITC
Short Description: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd has been cleared on its use of graphics chip technology owned by Nvidia Corp without permission, in a U.S. International Trade Commission ruling on Friday.

Title: U.S. government spending $425 million to build fastest supercomputers
Short Description: The U.S. Department of Energy said on Friday it is spending $425 million to research extreme-scale computing and build two super-computers, which would be the world's fastest, for research into basic science as well as nuclear weapons.

Title: Samsung Electronics fires back at Nvidia with chip patents lawsuit
Short Description: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd has accused Nvidia Corp of infringing several of its chip-related patents and for making false claims about its products, counter-suing after Nvidia filed a suit against the Korean company in September.
